Question
========

Peter is a basketball player who over the course of the season is successful with 80% of his free throws to success. During a crucial game, he misses 7 of his 12 free throws. *X* is the number of failed throws in 12 attempts. What is the probability of 7 or more failed throws out of 12 attempts?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,0001
* 0,0005
* 0,0033
* 0,0039

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.0001: Incorrect
* 0.0005: Incorrect
* 0.0033: Incorrect
* 0.0039: Correct
